page.title: 12Haymaking at Demesne Farm
page.content: First of all we let a field grow. Then we cut the grass and let it lie in the sun. Then we come and turn it with a haybob. When it is yellowy we bale it, then we go round and stack it in sevens. Then we come with a tractor with a perry loader on it. We put the stacks on the trailer. We take the trailer and unload it in the bays. Before we put the hay in the bays we have to put straw on the floor or the hay will rot. Sometimes we have to get powder to stop the hay becoming mouldy.
